acupoint.standard_location: 在膝后区，腘横纹中点，股二头肌腱与半腱肌腱之间
acupoint.standard_location_en: At the midpoint of the popliteal crease, between the tendons of biceps femoris and semitendinosus
acupoint.simple_method: 屈膝，在膝盖后面横纹的正中央凹陷处
acupoint.simple_method_en: Bend knee. Find the center of the crease behind the knee.
acupoint.anatomical: 腘窝中央，有腘动静脉，深层为腘静脉；布有股后皮神经，胫神经
indications: 腹痛吐泻 (abdominal pain, vomiting, diarrhea)
functions: 舒筋活络 (relax sinews, activate collaterals)
清热解毒 (clear heat, resolve toxins)
强腰健膝 (strengthen lumbar and knees)
